verbs.description: On his [ARGM-LOC: nationally] [V: syndicated] [ARG1: radio talk show] Thursday , host Mark Levin called out the media for celebrating former President Barack Obama , a man who “ did more in modern American history to abuse the media , ” while attacking President Donald Trump .
